short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A crypto wallet for the EVM compatible blockchains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An Areon Wallet for your Browser

A secure wallet and gateway to all the dapps on Areon Chain.

Whether you are an experienced user or brand new to blockchain, Pluto wallet helps you connect to the decentralized web: a new internet. 

The Pluto Wallet extension allows you to buy, send, spend, swap, and exchange your digital assets. Make payments to anyone, anywhere.
Log into websites securely to trade assets, lend, borrow, play games, publish content, buy rare digital art, and so much more just from a single gateway.

With Pluto Wallet, your keys and assets always stay in your control; 
• Generate passwords and keys on your browser and keep your accounts secure.
• Browse and connect to the decentralized websites.
• Control what information you share with the sites you use, and what to keep private.

If you already have a wallet, you can import your existing wallet. If you’re a new user, we'll help you get started!

Because Pluto Wallet adds functionality to your traditional browser, we require permission to read and write to any webpage.
